description: Story users field must list domain concepts

examples.description: List domain concepts from matching responsibilities
examples.content: Story 'Generate MCP Bot Server' has users: Human, Agile Bot, MCP Bot Server Generator, Bot Config - All are domain concepts from matching responsibilities

examples.description: Use capitalized domain concept names in users field
examples.content: Story 'Project Generates Project Scaffold' has users: Project, Project Bot State, File System - Match collaborators from 'Project: Provides Project Scaffold: File System'

examples.description: Don't use lowercase or abbreviated concept names
examples.content: Story 'Generate Server' has users: user, generator, config - Not using capitalized domain concept names
